Title: PDP risks technical collapse after Dec 7, BoT member warns
Summary: PDP risks technical collapse after Dec 7, BoT member warns . Hon. Tajudeen Yusuf has delivered a sweeping and scathing assessment of the deepening crisis within the party .

Title: Russia says captured three more Ukrainian villages
Summary: Russia says it has captured three more villages in eastern Ukraine . Moscow’s defence ministry said troops had seized Petrivske in the region . US, Ukrainian and European officials gathered in Geneva to discuss a controversial plan to end the war .

Title: Pope urges release of 315 seized in Nigerian mass school kidnapping
Summary: Pope Leo XIV called for the release of over 300 hostages taken from a Catholic school in one of the largest mass kidnappings in Nigeria . The Pope urges release of 315 seized in Nigerian mass school kidnapping .

Title: 50 out of 315 schoolchildren kidnapped in Niger have escaped — CAN
Summary: 50 of the more than 300 children snatched from a Catholic school in Nigeria have escaped their captors, a Christian group said in a statement Sunday . CAN: “We have received some good news as fifty pupils escaped and have escaped’

Title: EU rolls out €30m initiative to strengthen Africa–Europe creative networks
Summary: EU rolls out €30m initiative to strengthen Africa–Europe creative networks . AEPC Nigeria Cluster aims to expand creative networks and build stronger bridges between Africa and Europe .

Title: Gbenga Hashim mourns Segun Awolowo, describes him as humble, deeply patriotic
Summary: Presidential hopeful and businessman Gbenga Hashim pays heartfelt tribute to late Segun Awolowo . Former Executive Director of the Nigerian Export Promotion Council (NEPC) and grandson of Chief Obafemi Awolowe . Hashim describes him as humble, deeply patriotic and humble .

Title: Gov Abdulrazaq commends president’s hands-on approach as Eruku 38 regain freedom
Summary: HE AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq (CON) is excited to announce the freedom of 38 persons who were recently abducted in an attack on Christ Apostolic Church (CAC) Eruku, Ekiti LGA, Kwara Kwara . Gov Abdulrazaq commends president’s hands-on approach as Eru

Title: I’m closely monitoring security situation, receiving updates from frontline – TINUBU
Summary: Bola Tinubu expressed excitement over the rescue of 38 worshippers abducted in Eruku, Kwara State . The return of 51 students kidnapped in a Catholic School in Niger State .

Title: Daughter of South Africa president accused of recruiting for Russian forces
Summary: South African police are investigating claims that a daughter of ex-president Jacob Zuma was involved in recruiting men to join Russian mercenaries in the Ukraine war . Police: Daughter of South Africa president accused of recruiting for Russian forces .

Title: Nigeria reaffirms commitment to social protection amid West Africa’s coverage challenges
Summary: Federal Government has reiterated commitment to strengthening social protection as a key pillar of national development . The Federal Government emphasized its role in fostering inclusive growth, economic stability, and human development . Nigeria reaffirms commitment to social protection amid West Africa's coverage challenges .
